title: Fuck Riot and their retarded bans

Suck My Dick Tantram

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

Well, you DID make it up completely and try to tell the other team Morgana used hate speech. Literally nobody used hate speech except you.

Should you be penalized for trying to pin unacceptable behavior on someone else when you are the one who used it? Probably.

Looking into this also brought to my attention some other questionable behavior that I'll be sending the player support.

Here is a cute puppy.

http://www.cutestpaw.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/11/Miss-You-My-Love.jpg
Sir, he gave you a puppy.

i missed it again... T.T

but kittehs have claws?!

Hello there! I've edited out the quoted part of your comment as it did not fit in with the [Universal Rules](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules); namely, the quoted comment was disrespectful to fellow Boards members. If you have questions, feel free to talk to us in the The [Boards Moderation Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/qVlculPP-boards-moderation-discord) or the [Discuss the Boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board.

Happens all the time, that's fine.
Seems like I got here a bit too late......care to summarize what this guy said, while trying to sugar coat it so it doesn't break board rules?
"I'm angry, but don't know how to express that anger in a healthy fashion".

Still not sure what's the end goal of people like the OP when they try to mislead the boards. Do they just think Riot will throw up their hands and say, "Oh, you have community support, I guess we'll not look into the ban and just reverse it"?

Your acting like this game is 4+ the game is 13 and up fricken Kled says worse stuff than this like you all are being way too overdramatic about toxicity u added in the mute button the problem is solved.
Tantram is pointing out the OP was intentionally trying to abuse the system in an attempt to get someone banned.

ONE GAME CHAT LOGS PERMABANNED LOL
Don't try to high jack a thread. Go create your own. Make sure to include punishment history like when your 14 day ban was.

Judging from your match history, you were banned for 2 week for intentionally feeding as yasuo Jan 27th (0/11/1 with multiple tears). That places you on thin ice immediately, so your behavior afterwards got you banned.
You can actually get a 2 week for int/troll and a 2 week for toxicity. Since they run on a different system you can receive punishment respectfully for each.

The punishments are supposed to stack.  Unless something has changed very recently, once you hit the third punishment tier for anything, the next punishment is a permaban if the account hasn't worked itself back into better standing.  While the modules for detecting the two are separate ( standard IFS toxicity and FeederBuster) the overall account standing has always been cumulative since they were activated.
I will work on trying to find an official source to cite for a confirmation. I am basing it off some people being confused how they got two 14 day bans in close proximity.
Definitely let us know if you find one!  I would hate to be telling people the wrong information and having them be worried more than necessary.

THE 0RPHAN
February 22nd 2018, 9:45:01 pm
Hey there,

No problem! I can say they are separate tracks for penalties. One does not influence another. In your example they would receive a 2 week ban for intentional feeding/trolling if they got off of a 2 week ban for toxicity.

Hope that clears things up for you.

The 0rphan
Riot Games Player Support
Morgana Support


We have our answer. Now we both know for certain! ^.^

> ONE GAME CHAT LOGS PERMABANNED LOL

The problem is in this case, is that you don't get perma-banned for a simple game. You usually get a certain amount of games chat restricted, then a 14 day ban, then a permaban, unless you had used any of the trigger words that cause bans on the spot/over a couple days if necessary after account review.

So if this is the 'tamest' thing you have, you might have done worse things earlier.

The problem was here that you said one of the trigger words used by the system to auto-punish people.

If someone else says a word like this, or many others, please, don't say it 2-3 times over, since the system can't tell if you're telling it to someone, or just repeating what they said.

Send in a ticket and see what happens, but I have a feeling they won't do much about it, since the point of not allowing it is just that, regardless of context.
Your title alone says enough...don't even need to read the logs.

I love it when people think Riot isn't really paying attention, then Tantram shows up and says, "oh and I saw some other nasty stuff in there that I'll forward over".

{{champion:51}}
